item.title: These guys moved to real hardware, it cost them half as much as AWS, and it w...
item.description:
These guys moved to real hardware, it cost them half as much as AWS, and it was better in almost every way.  Why is the cloud so popular?  Is it time for Netflix to publish another AWS love story?
